attributes.action: To put through legislation to ban Halal meat,
attributes.additional_details: We must stop the sale etc of Halal meat, the disgusting way it is done to slaughter animals, it needs to stop, not to be sold or served, or given to children in schools, let's abolish this barbaric way to slaughter animals, let's stop it from being sold in the supermarkets & food stores around Britain
attributes.background: To stop the barbaric way of Halal slaughter of animals & never to be sold, to the public & put in supermarkets etc,

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Ban the non-stun slaughter of animals
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/729708
